introduction.title: 1. Introduction
content: Welcome to Eye On Idea. These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of our website (eyeonidea.com) and the digital services we provide. By accessing our website or engaging our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

Eye On Idea is a sole proprietorship (enkeltmandsvirksomhed) registered in Denmark under CVR: 45356175, with registered address in Aalborg, Denmark. You can reach us at hello{'@'}eyeonidea.com or by phone at +45 29 93 05 83.
These Terms are intended for business-to-business (B2B) engagements. If you are a consumer, additional statutory rights under Danish and EU consumer protection law may apply.

services.title: 2. Services
content: Eye On Idea provides digital consultancy services including but not limited to: website design and development, visual identity creation, content management system (CMS) implementation, and ongoing support and maintenance services.

All services are provided on a project basis with individual scoping and pricing. Specific deliverables, timelines, and costs are defined in a written project proposal or statement of work before any work commences.

engagement.title: 3. Project Engagement
content: A binding agreement is formed upon written acceptance of a project proposal (via email or signed document) and, where applicable, receipt of the agreed deposit.

The project scope, deliverables, timeline, and pricing are defined in the project proposal. Any changes to the agreed scope must be confirmed in writing by both parties and may result in adjusted pricing and delivery dates.

You agree to provide all necessary materials, content, feedback, and approvals in a timely manner to facilitate project completion. Delays caused by late delivery of materials or feedback may extend project timelines accordingly.

payment.title: 4. Payment Terms
content: Payment terms are specified in individual project proposals. Unless otherwise agreed, standard terms require a deposit of 30-50% before work begins, with the remaining balance due upon project completion and delivery.
Invoices are payable within 14 days of the invoice date unless a different payment term is agreed in writing.

Late payments are subject to interest in accordance with the Danish Interest Act (Renteloven), currently the Danish National Bank's reference rate plus 8 percentage points per annum, calculated from the due date.
All prices are quoted in Danish Kroner (DKK) or Euros (EUR) as specified in the proposal. Prices are exclusive of VAT (moms) at the applicable rate (currently 25%) unless explicitly stated otherwise.

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
content: Upon receipt of full payment, all intellectual property rights in custom work created specifically for your project, including bespoke designs, custom code, and original content, are transferred to you. This transfer is effective only upon full and final payment in accordance with Section 55 of the Danish Copyright Act (Ophavsretsloven).

Eye On Idea retains ownership of pre-existing tools, reusable code libraries, development frameworks, general methodologies, and know-how that were not created specifically for your project or that existed prior to the engagement.

Third-party assets such as stock images, fonts, icons, and software plugins remain subject to their respective license terms. Eye On Idea will inform you of any third-party licensing obligations relevant to your project.
Eye On Idea reserves the right to reference and showcase completed work in portfolios, case studies, and marketing materials, unless a written confidentiality or non-disclosure agreement is in place.

confidentiality.title: 6. Confidentiality
content: Both parties undertake to keep confidential any proprietary, commercial, or technical information disclosed during the engagement that is marked as confidential or that a reasonable person would consider confidential.
Confidential information includes, but is not limited to, business strategies, pricing structures, technical specifications, unpublished designs, and login credentials.

Confidentiality obligations survive the termination of our engagement and remain in effect for a period of two (2) years after termination, unless the information becomes publicly available through no fault of the receiving party.

warranties.title: 7. Warranties and Liability
content: Eye On Idea warrants that all services will be performed with reasonable professional skill and care consistent with generally accepted industry standards.

Delivered websites and digital products are tested for functionality and compatibility on current versions of major browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) at the time of delivery. Ongoing compatibility with future browser versions or third-party updates is not guaranteed and may be covered under a separate maintenance agreement.

A defect notification period of 30 days applies from the date of delivery. During this period, Eye On Idea will remedy any material defects in the delivered work at no additional cost, provided the defects are documented and reported in writing.

Eye On Idea is not liable for issues arising from: (a) modifications made by the client or third parties after delivery, (b) third-party integrations or services not managed by Eye On Idea, (c) failure to follow provided instructions or documentation, or (d) circumstances beyond our reasonable control (force majeure).

To the maximum extent permitted by law, Eye On Idea's total aggregate liability for any claim arising out of or in connection with a project shall not exceed the total fees actually paid by you for the specific project giving rise to the claim. Eye On Idea shall not be liable for indirect, consequential, or incidental damages, including loss of profit, data, or business opportunity.

termination.title: 8. Termination
content: Either party may terminate a project engagement by providing 14 days' written notice to the other party. Upon termination, payment is due for all work completed up to the effective date of termination.
In the event of a material breach by either party that remains uncured for 14 days after written notice, the non-breaching party may terminate the agreement with immediate effect.

Upon termination and receipt of all outstanding payments, Eye On Idea will deliver all completed work, source files, and necessary handover documentation. Work-in-progress may be delivered in its current state.

You may not use this website for any unlawful purpose or in any manner that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair the website or interfere with other users' access.

governing.title: 10. Governing Law and Disputes
content: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Denmark, without regard to its conflict of laws provisions.

In the event of a dispute, the parties shall first attempt to resolve the matter amicably through good-faith negotiation. If a resolution cannot be reached, disputes shall be submitted to the Aalborg City Court (Retten i Aalborg) as the court of first instance.
If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect.
